title: Olfactory dysfunction after SARS-CoV-2-Infection?
text: This presentation provides a comprehensive overview of the effects of SARS-CoV-2 infection on the olfactory system, with a particular focus on healthy young adults. It explores the prevalence, mechanisms, and potential long-term consequences of olfactory dysfunction following SARS-CoV-2 infection.

title: Thibault Lovey  MD, PhD
text:
My name is Thibault and I am a medical professional with a passion for public health and humanitarian medicine. In December 2020, I joined the PHD program at the Epidemiology, Biostatistics and Prevention Institute, under the supervision of Prof. Dr. Patricia Schlagenhauf. My research focuses on respiratory infections, with a particular interest in Long Covid and tracking infections using mobile applications.
On my website, you’ll find my CV, publications, and talks. If you have any questions or just want to say hello, please don’t hesitate to reach out. I love connecting with new people and am always happy to chat. Thank you for visiting and enjoy your time here!
